formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: An UNKNOWN FUNCTION CHILD error occurs in GenFunc[19] with the following message:

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: The FlattenExprs had a number of issues with the lft helper. Firstly, it was called on scope root expressions, while its semantics was only for inner expression nodes that are not already at the scope root. Additionally, there was a type error which resulted in empty node elements appearing in the result code.
